banner.headline: Earn money with your Facebook profile It's child's play!
banner.sub_headline: Keep enjoying your Facebook account as always and every month you will get your money. We generate it for you.

cards.title: Complete the form
cards.info: We offer you to join our program in a few clicks and start earning online, without any additional effort!

cards.title: Wait for our confirmation
cards.info: Confirmation takes 3-5 business days! * (Usually within 48 hours!)

cards.title: Receive monthly payments
cards.info: While you go about your normal life, we make your Facebook account generate profit for you!

cards.title: Share with your friends
cards.info: Share with your friends and increase your earnings. You will receive a payment for each new registration referred by you. Unlimited!

p_2.0: Activate your referral code and win

testimonies.title: What do people say?
testimonies.info: People who joined us and are already making money!

testimonies.testimony: I have collaborated with fb4cash for more than a year, I have not had any problems. The money is always on time and I always receive answers to all my questions. It's great that I don't have to do anything, and besides, it doesn't affect my profile at all. Let's say I just make money by renting my Facebook account. I recommend it to everybody!
testimonies.author: Ana Martin

testimonies.testimony: I decided to try to make money with FB4cash, since I was interested to know how it works. I can say that it is a great way to have additional income. I simply had to fill out the form AND NOTHING ELSE! The guys take care of the rest, I just collect my money in my PayPal account.
testimonies.author: Tony Smith

testimonies.testimony: When in my country we had to go to the confinement due to covid-19, I was left without work, and without income, a friend explained to me that she had an extra income by renting her Facebook to advertise advertising, I was a bit skeptical but I decided to try, and the truth is that so far I have not had any problems, the payments are always punctual, and they have always paid me for all the friends that I have brought. I recommend it!
testimonies.author: Alena Due

how_it_works.title: How does it work?

info.p_1: The process is really simply. If you have a Facebook account, you are probably familiar with ads and banners on Facebook. They are everywhere, all the time, and a lot of people are making money from it.
info.p_2: What you don't know is that you can also, and very easily, rent your Facebook account, without doing anything.
info.p_3: Since Facebook is a protected corporate entity, protecting the activity and rights of its users, this will not affect you or your online activity at all.
info.p_4: None of your friends will receive spam or see your ads, and we will still pay you, just for using the advertising part of your profile.

how_it_works.faq_link: Check our F.A.Q section for more information

requirements.title: Profile requirements
list: It must be real, active, with a photo and real name that matches the name of your document
With at least 100 friends
At least one year old

With appropriate content, do not administer photos that show any type of violence against humans or animals, photos of sexual content, apology for terrorism or of high political significance, as well as any other type that may be considered socially offensive
You must be of legal age
It must not have been previously used or rented to other companies for the use of advertising
You must have an email associated with your profile

extra.p_2: Without closing the page, open another http://2fa.live, paste your Token and click “Submit”. Copy the last 6 numbers of the result.
extra.p_3: Also, if you prefer, you can use an App like Google Authenticator, Duo Mobile or LastPass..

p_2.0: Before having access to fill in your data, you will have to answer some simple questions about your Facebook profile to pre-evaluate if your profile meets the requirements, things like "How old is your account?", "How many friends do you have in your Facebook profile?", etc.

p_4.0: If your profile qualifies, you will have to fill in your details and attach a photo of a document to verify that your profile is real and that you are of legal age.

p_5.0: We will need a photo of your document in high resolution and legible, you can cover any detail you want, except the photo, the full name and the date of birth.

p_6.0: If you decide to cover any data, do not do it by editing the photo or Facebook will not admit it, use your fingers for example, or a piece of paper.

p_7.0: You can use, DNI, passport or driver's license, if you do not have any of them please
p_7.1: click here for a guide with alternative options.

p_8.2: that you created in step 1 and enter the

p_1.0: Once our team verifies that we can access your profile through 2FA and that indeed the Commercial Administrator (BM) is created and unrestricted, our team will finish configuring the BM and your first payment will be processed through Paypal.

p_2.0: Normally 4 to 5 business days after receiving your form, provided that the data is correct and we can access your profile and the Business Manager is not restricted.

p_3.0: Oh, and if you send us to your friends you get more money for each referral, take a look at our

p_4.0: You will receive the first payment once the account has been reviewed and a Business Manager has been correctly configured.

p_5.0: After the first payment the following monthly payments are made as follows:

p_6.0: The profiles activated in the first fortnight of the month (first 2 weeks) will be paid the week of the 15th of the following month.

p_7.0: Profiles activated in the second half of the month (last 2 weeks) will be paid at the end of the month.

p_8.0: The payment of referrals is always made at the end of the month, our team will contact you to confirm the number of referrals registered by you and make the corresponding payment.

p_1.0: You can contact us at any time to resolve any questions, and it could also be that we eventually need to contact you to resolve anything.

p_3.0: Sooner or later Facebook will ask you to change the password or perhaps you decide to change it, if this happens,
p_3.2: , otherwise you may create problems for us since we will not be able to use the account and we will not be able to pay you.

intro.title: TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR FACEBOOK ADVERTISING RENTALS
p: The following Terms and Conditions apply to renting your Facebook profile, and with your consent you agree to be bound thereby.

definitions.title: Definitions
p: For the purposes of these Terms and Conditions:
"Rental" of the rental of your Facebook profile to which these Terms and Conditions apply.
"FB4cash" , this website, their respective agents, subcontractors, directors and employees.
"Owner" is the person who provided the Facebook profile that is being rented.
"Monthly Payment" is the amount paid to the account owner at the end of each month that their account is in use.
"Referral commission" is the amount paid to someone for recommending another Facebook profile owner to lead to a successful Business Manager setup.
"Facebook Profile" is the access to the Business Manager that is rented.
"Business Manager" is a Facebook tool that helps to organize and manage your advertising accounts completely independent of your Facebook profile.
"Business Manager Administrator" the person who actively manages the Business Manager on behalf of FB4cash and who will be added to monitor the advertising accounts.
"Ad account" is the Facebook advertising account that is configured within Business Manager.
"Business Manager Configuration" the configuration process for the Facebook Business Manager to be rented.
"Facebook Page" the Facebook page created with the Owner's account.
"Advertising" the ads created by FB4cash in the Owner's account.
"Commission for configuration" is the amount paid to the owner of the account for a correct configuration of the Business Manager.

"Third-party social media service" means any service or content (including data, information, products, or services) provided by a third party that may be displayed, included, or made available by the Service.
"Website" refers to My site, accessible from FB4cash.com

"You or the Owner "means the person who provided the Facebook advertising account that is being rented and, in any event, the person accessing or using the Service, or the company or other legal entity on whose behalf such person accesses or uses the Service, as appropriate.
"Company" (referred to as "the Company" ,"We" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to FB4cash.

recognition.title: Acknowledgment
p: These are the Terms and Conditions that govern the use of this Service and the agreement that operates between You and the Company. These Terms and Conditions establish the rights and obligations of all users with respect to the use of the Service.

Your access and use of the Service is conditional on your acceptance and compliance with these Terms and Conditions. These Terms and Conditions apply to all visitors, users and other persons who access or use the Service.
By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to any part of these Terms and Conditions, you will not be able to access the Service.
You declare that you are over 18 years old. The Company does not allow minors under 18 years of age to use the Service.

Your access to and use of the Service is also conditioned on your acceptance and compliance with the Company's Privacy Policy. Our Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of Your personal information when using the Application or the Site. web site and informs You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. Please read our Privacy Policy carefully before using our service.

service_condition.title: Terms of Service
p: The Owner authorizes the Company, to exercise exclusively, the right of access and management of the commercial account solely and exclusively for the creation of advertising campaigns related to the Facebook Social Network, for an indefinite time, unless the parties, mutually agree, agree to a different duration.

By virtue of this contract, the Company has the right to exercise on its own behalf, on behalf of the Owner, the actions necessary to pursue the purpose established in the contract, that is, for the creation, preparation, execution and control of advertising campaigns or of communication. Actions on the Internet and social sites assigned by the Owner.

privacy.title: Privacy
p: We respect your privacy and will never share your password or any other personal information. During the Business Manager setup process, we use a secure application to allow us to set up your advertising accounts, while keeping your personal information safe.

property_promise.title: Property Pledge
p: The Owner guarantees and guarantees that he is the legal owner of the Advertising Account and that he is the only person with access. In addition, the Owner guarantees that there is no irregularity in the creation or acquisition of the account. In addition, the Owner guarantees that he does not need or depend on the ability to advertise on Facebook..

compensation.title: Compensation
p: The Owner agrees to indemnify FB4cash if he has in any way violated the promise of ownership clause.

payment.title: Payment
p: FB4cash will pay the owner the setup fee once the first review has been done and approved, and a Business Manager has been properly setup.

payment_calendar.title: Payment schedule
p: FB4cash will pay the Owner as follows:
First payment directly after successful setup and after as follows:
The profiles activated in the first fortnight of the month (first 2 weeks) will be paid in the week of the 15th of the following month
Profiles activated within the second half of the month (last 2 weeks) will be paid in the week of the last week of the following month.
If the last day of the month falls on a weekend or holiday, the payment will be sent the next business day.

FB4cash will not pay for a Facebook profile where it has not been possible to configure the Business Manager correctly. FB4cash will pay the monthly payment for a Facebook profile that is active for half the month or more for the particular month.
Payments for each referral that results in a successful setup are paid at the end of the month.
FB4cash will not pay for a Facebook profile where it has not been possible to correctly configure the Business Manager.

payment_method.title: Payment Method
p: FB4cash will send payments by Paypal and bank transfer.
To be paid by bank it is necessary to send a copy of a document to comply with the requirements of our bank.

rental_termination.title: Account rental termination
p: The rental period will end on the day the Business Manager is no longer in use.
FB4cash, at its sole discretion, may decide that it no longer requires the account and may interrupt the rental period.
The Rental will also be canceled if the Business Manager is deactivated by the Owner or Facebook.
If the account was used for 15 days or more that month, FB4cash will make the payment of the monthly payment.
The rental period will also end if there is a material breach of these Terms.

material_violation.title: Material violation
p: In case of material breach, FB4cash will not be responsible for paying any future payments.
Log into Account from any device that was not used before the start of the rental period. Pause, stop, change or interfere in any way with FB4cash advertisements.
Delete or remove FB4cash Business Manager or Administrator from Facebook page.

Delete or remove the FB4cash account manager from the Ad Account Manager role. Use of the FB4cash payment method for any purpose other than to pay for Ads created by FB4cash. Allow any other person or business to access or use the Ad Account .
Login to Facebook with a desktop or laptop from a new location that you had not logged in to in the period before the rental period.
Login to Business Manager for any reason.

limited_liability.title: Limitation of liability
p: The Holder acknowledges that the Company is not responsible for incidents that the account may suffer for reasons beyond its control and action. The Holder declares to know the risks, dangers, as well as any other eventuality and / or incident that the exposure entails and use of a personal and / or professional profile in a Social Network that operates through the Internet; likewise, it waives any administrative, criminal procedural claim, as well as any compensation.

Without prejudice to any damages that may incur, the entire liability of the Company and any of its suppliers under any provision of these Terms and your exclusive remedy for all of the above will be limited to the amount actually paid by you through the Service.

To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, in no event shall the Company or its suppliers be liable for any special, incidental, indirect, or consequential damages (including, but not limited to, loss of profits, loss of data or other information, due to business interruption, personal injury, loss of privacy arising out of or in any way related to the use or inability to use the Service, third party software and / or third party hardware used with the Service, or otherwise in connection with any provision of these Terms), even if the Company or any provider has been informed of the possibility of such damages and even if the remedy does not fulfill its essential purpose.

Some states do not allow the exclusion of implied warranties or the limitation of liability for incidental or consequential damages, which means that some of the above limitations may not apply. In these states, each party's liability will be limited to the fullest extent permitted. by the law.

disclaimer.title: Limitation of liability
p: The Service is provided to you "JUST AS IT IS" and "AS IT IS AVAILABLE" with all faults and defects without warranty of any kind. To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, the Company, on its own behalf and on behalf of its Affiliates and its respective licensors and service providers, expressly disclaims all warranties, whether express, implied, legal or otherwise, with respect to the Service, including all implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title and non-infringement, and warranties that may arise from the course of deal, course of performance, use, or business practice. Without limitation to the foregoing, the Company makes no warranty or commitment, and makes no representation of any kind that Service will meet Your requirements, achieve intended results, be compatible or work with any other software, application, system or service, operate without interruption, comply with the es standards of performance or reliability or be free of errors or that any errors or defects can or will be corrected.

Notwithstanding the foregoing, neither the Company nor any of the company's suppliers makes any representation or warranty of any kind, express or implied: (i) regarding the operation or availability of the Service, or the information, content and materials or products included therein; (ii) that the Service will be uninterrupted or error-free; (iii) regarding the accuracy, reliability or validity of any information or content provided through the Service; or (iv) that the Service, its servers, content or emails sent from or on behalf of the Company are free of viruses, scripts, Trojans, worms, malware, time bombs or other harmful components.

Some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion of certain types of warranties or limitations on the applicable legal rights of a consumer, so some or all of the above exclusions and limitations may not apply to you. But in such case, the stated exclusions and limitations in this section will be applied to the fullest extent required by applicable law.

dispute_resolution.title: Dispute resolution
p: If you have a problem or dispute about the Service, you agree to first try to resolve the dispute informally by contacting the Company.
For users in the European Union (EU).
If you are a consumer in the European Union, you will benefit from the mandatory provisions of the law of the country in which you reside.

p.message: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision will be changed and interpreted to achieve the objectives of that provision to the fullest extent possible under applicable law and the remaining provisions will continue in full force and effect.

Except as provided herein, failure to exercise a right or require compliance with an obligation under these Terms will not affect the ability of a party to exercise said right or require such compliance at any later time, nor will the waiver of a breach will constitute a waiver of any subsequent breach.

interpretation.title: Translation interpretation
p: These Terms and Conditions may have been translated if we have made them available to you on our Service. You agree that the original English text shall prevail in the event of a dispute You agree that the original English text shall prevail in the event of a dispute.

change_terms.title: Changes to these terms and conditions
p: We reserve the right, in our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will use reasonable efforts to provide at least 30 days notice before the new terms take effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined in our sole discretion.

By continuing to access or use Our Service after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms. If you do not agree to the new terms, in whole or in part, stop using the website and the service.

contact.title: Contact Us
p: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, you can contact us

referral_program.title: Become a referrer

info.1: seriously increase your earnings and get

p_1.0: It's very easy, you just have to share the link of our page with your friends or acquaintances and make sure that in the registration form they add your reference code in the box
p_1.1: "If you have a reference, add your code here."

p_2.4: . In which you can request a personalized code, our team will confirm shortly the registration of your new code in our system.

p_3.0: If your profile has not been eligible to register with us, don't worry, you can still earn money by introducing us to friends or acquaintances, simply register at
p_3.2: and our team will confirm your registration.

p_4.0: The payment of referrals is always made at the end of the month, our team will contact you to confirm the number of referrals registered by you and make the corresponding payment.

p_5.1: Make sure your referrals always use your code number when completing the form, in order to know that they are your referrals and we can generate your next payment.

referral_program.tiny: For each person who registers her profile with us and is valid

questions.question: Why don't we create our own profiles?
answer: We are only using your FB ad account, which has a separate login from your normal FB profile.

questions.question: How do I know that my profile will not be published and that my information will not be shared?
answer: We are only using your FB ad account, which has a separate login from your normal FB profile.

Facebook is a protected corporate entity, which protects the activity and rights of its users. Therefore, there is a clear separation between your personal account, and that of the company (advertising).
So you can be sure that your friends will not receive spam or see your ads or advertising activity.

questions.question: Is this a scam? Will I be scammed?
answer: No, this is not a scam and we will not scam you. We are online advertisers who use Facebook accounts to set up paid ads. Facebook limits the number of ad accounts each user receives. As this is our main business activity, we are looking to acquire the largest number of accounts to be able to run more ads. We connect our own company's credit card to the account and all payments for Facebook advertising will go through it. You are not at risk.

questions.question: Are we breaking the rules?
answer: No. Selling your profile is against Facebook policy. We do not buy profiles, we simply rent them to access and use ad accounts that are not used.

account_secure.title: Your account is safe, please know that:
list: We use your profile only to log into Facebook Business Manager, (https://business.facebook.com/) which is completely separate from your profile. Most users don't even know it exists.
You can continue to use your account while we test and serve ads.
No one will know that the ads are running and your friends will never see anything (unless you tell them and show them your new earnings)
Nothing will ever be posted on your wall.
We never look at your personal profile, messages or any other activity, we only use the business account we created.
We will never sell, transfer or publish your personal information.

side.title: Contact us
info: How can we help you? Do you need help with your payments?
For any questions related to payments or your account, please contact the local manager in your area.
You can also ask questions in our Telegram group,
